    Collaborations with high-end maker: SENJU

    Kisco is the official agent of Senju in Vietnam, we are a leading company in the field of providing solutions and products for the customers. electronic and mechanical factory. With a presence in Vietnam, Kisco has built a reputation and positioned itself as a trusted partner in the industry.
    Kisco Vietnam specializes in supplying all kinds of solder tin, solder lead, solder paste and other related products of Senju to the Vietnam market. Senju products are manufactured using advanced technology and rigorous quality processes, ensuring outstanding quality and performance in all electronic welding applications.
    With a team of experienced engineers and experts, Kisco Vietnam is committed to fully meet the requirements and needs of customers. We are always looking for the latest innovations and solutions to meet the increasingly demanding requirements of the industry.

    Visiting Senju Malaysia factory

    Introduction of SMIC Senju Metal Industry Co., Ltd.

    The history of soldering goes back about 5,000 years, but basic soldering always uses Sn-Pb flux consisting of tin and lead. However, groundwater lead pollution has been recognized as an environmental problem and the complete elimination of lead use is called for.


    Realizing that protecting the environment is our duty in the 21st century, SMIC seriously expanded our research in this area and developed lead-free "ECO SOLDER".


    In the soldering industry, the selection of quality solder is an important factor in ensuring the best welding results. And when it comes to quality and reliability, Senju's solder paste cannot be ignored. With years of experience and a commitment to research and development, Senju has built a reputation as a leading soldering iron brand and trusted by professionals worldwide. Whether you are a professional soldering engineer or a beginner in the field, Senju soldering iron will accompany you to create quality and reliable welds.


    Our various product range list:

  • Solder Bar/Rod
  • Flux Cored Wire
  • Solder Paste
  • Solder Preform
  • Solder Balls
  • Post Flux
  • Semiconductor Flux
  • Lead-containing Solder alloy

    • * SMIC, ECO SOLDER, ECO Welding Solution, ECOtronics and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Senju Metal Industry Co., Ltd.

    General best-selling product grade

    Senju Solder Cored Wire

    Senju's premium solder tin is a quality product manufactured by Senju Metal Industry Co., Ltd. (Senju) production. Senju is one of the leading manufacturers in the metal welding industry and has many years of experience in providing high quality welding products to various industries.
    Senju's premium lead-free solder is a trusted choice for companies and individuals in the metal soldering industry. With high quality, good performance and reliability, this product helps to ensure a powerful and efficient welding process.

    Best-selling item: RMA02 P3 M705

    Senju Solder Paste

    Senju Solder Cream is a high quality solder paste manufactured by Senju Metal Industry Co., Ltd., a leader in metal welding. Senju has many years of experience in developing and supplying high quality solder products for the electronics and other industries.
    Senju solder paste is a trusted choice for businesses in the metal welding industry. With its high quality, good performance and commitment to the environment, this product meets the rigorous requirements of the welding process and guarantees the quality and reliability of the welded connections.

    Best-selling item: S70G, GRN360-K2, ULT369 series

    Senju Solder Bar

    Senju Metal Industry Co., Ltd. is a leader in metal welding and manufactures a wide range of high quality welding products, including welding rods. Here's some general information about Senju's high-quality solder bar.
    Senju's high quality solder bar is a trusted choice for companies and individuals in the metal welding industry. With high quality, good performance and reliability, this product helps to ensure a powerful and efficient welding process.

    Best-selling item: M705 (SAC305)

    Senju Post Flux

    Senju Flux is a high quality solder paste manufactured by Senju Metal Industry Co., Ltd., a leader in metal welding. Senju has many years of experience in developing and supplying high quality solder products for the electronics and other industries.
    Senju Flux is a trusted choice for businesses in the metal welding industry. With its high quality, good performance and commitment to the environment, this product meets the rigorous requirements of the welding process and guarantees the quality and reliability of the welded connections.

    Best-selling item: ESR-250 T4
